cgc_sync__Sync_History_Detail__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_History_Detail__c
cgc_sync__Sync_History_Detail__c.description: Contains detailed information about all sync history records.

cgc_sync__Api_Calls__c.description: Number of API calls made during the synchronization process.

cgc_sync__Duration__c.description: Time taken to complete the synchronization process.

cgc_sync__End_Date_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the synchronization process is completed.

cgc_sync__Processed_Records__c.description: Number of records processed during the synchronization process.

cgc_sync__Start_Date_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the synchronization process started.

cgc_sync__Sync_History__c.description: Refers to the related sync history.

cgc_sync__Sync_Step__c.description: Sync step used when the sync history was uploaded.

cgc_sync__Sync_Success__c.description: Indicates whether the sync completed successfully (true) or not (false).
